name: S.O.S. (EverettHSGames)
description:
Controls:

WASD - movement        SPACE - interact

Task:

Open the door after obtaining a key from the crate avoid enemy 

Story:

The protagonist has been enveloped in a state of emotional confinement, alienated from any form of social engagement. Ultimately, he resolves to reclaim his life and reintegrate into society. However, this requires him to overcome his negative habits by completing a set of prescribed rituals and break free from the limitations of his home.
